title: Tutorial "how to create pixelfonts in Fontographer!
content:
Hey Guys,   
   
I�m looking for a tutorial how to create PixelFonts for Flash or other screen-use. Something like this (but in english) [http://www.typoidea.com/tutorial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125557/http:/www.typoidea.com/tutorial/)   
my spanish isn�t that good... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125557im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I�m mostly interessted how to do the main settings for size, kerning etc. There was a great tut over at atomicmedia, but it seems not to be still online!   
   
Thank you in advance!
author: daniel_g�nther

comments.content: The google translation [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125557/http:/translate.google.com/translate?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.typoidea.com%2Ftutorial%2F&langpair=es%7Cen&hl=en&ie=ISO-8859-1&prev=%2Flanguage_tools) is almost understandable. :0)
Yeees, thank you Kemie. Exactly what i was looking for!
